gurmukhi: cIn hY n bwnI suBg BvwnI pwp krm riq huie hYN ]gurdyv n mwnY Bl n bKwnY AMq nrk kh jY hYN ]68]
transliteration: Cheen Hai Na Baanisoubhag Bhabaanipaap Karam Rat(i) Hue Hain|| Gurdev Na Maanai Bhal Na Bakhaanai Nnt Narak Kah Jai Hain||68||
translation: They will not recognise any of their gods and goddesses and even their own sayings; they will always be absorbed in evil acts; they will not accept the advice of their Guru; they will not describe any acts of goodness and will ultimately go to hell.68.

gurmukhi: jp hY n BvwnI khwnI pwp krm riq AYsy ]min hY n dyvM AlK AByvM durkiRqM muinvr jYsy ]
transliteration: Jap Hai Na Bhabaani Kahaani Paap Karam Rat(i) Aise|| Man(i) Hai Na Devan Alakh Abhevan Durkritan Mounndvar Jaise||
translation: By not worshipping the goddess and being absorbed in vicious acts, the people will perform the inexpressible task; they will not believe in God and even the sages will perform the vicious acts;

gurmukhi: cIn hY n bwqM pr qRIA rwqM Drmix krm audwsI ]jwin hY n bwqM AiDk AigAwqM AMq nrk ky bwsI ]69]
transliteration: Chin Hai Na Baatan Par Treeya Raatan Dharman(i) Karam Udaasee|| Jaan(i) Hai Na Baatan Adhik Agiaatan Ant Narak Ke Baasi||69||
translation: Being dejected with the religious rituals, the people will not recognise anyone and remain absorbed with the wives of other; not caring for anyoneâ€™s utterance and becoming extremely ignorant they will ultimately go to reside in hell.69.

gurmukhi: inq nv mq kr hYN hir nnusir hYN pRB ko nwm n lY hYN ]sRuiq ismiRiq n mwnY qjq kurwnY Aaur hI pYNf bqY hYN ]
transliteration: Nit Nav Mat Kar Hain Har(i) Nanousar(i) Hain Prabh Ko Naam Na Lai Hain|| Srouti Simriti Na Maanai Tajat Kuraanai Aur Hipaind Batai Hain||
translation: They will always adopt new sects and without remembering the Name of the Lord, they will not have any faith in Him; forsaking the Vedas, Smritis and Quaran etc. they will adopt new path;

gurmukhi: pr qRIA rs rwcy sq ky kwcy inj qRIA gmn n kr hYN ]mwn hYN n eykM pUj AnykM AMq nrk mih pr hYN ]70]
transliteration: Par Treea Ras Raache Sat Ke Kaadhe Nij Treea Gadanndna Kar Hain|| Maan Hain Na Ekan Pooj Anekan Ant Narak Maih Par Hain||70||
translation: Being absorbed in the enjoyment of the wives of others and relinquishing the path of truth, they will not love their own wives; having no faith in the one Lord, they will worship many and ultimately go to hell.70.

gurmukhi: pwhn pujY hY eyk n iDAY hY mq ky ADk ADyrw ]AMmiRq khu qij hY ibK khu Bij hY swJih khih svYrw ]
transliteration: Paahan Pounai Hai Ek Na Dhiai Hai Mat Ke Adhak Adheraa|| Anmrit Kauh Taj(i) Hai Bikh Kauh Bhaj(i) Hai Saajhah(i) Kahah(i) Saveraa||
translation: Worshipping the stones, they will not meditate on the one Lord; there will be prevalent the darkness of many sects; they will desire for poison, leaving the embrosia, they will name the evening time as early-morn;

gurmukhi: Pokt Drmix riq kukiRq ibnw mq kho khw Pl pY hY ]bwNDy miRqswlY jwih auqwlY AMD ADogiq jY hY ]71]
transliteration: Phokat Dharamanndi) Rat(i) Koukrit Binaa Mat Kaho Kahaa Phal Pai Hai|| Baandhe Mritsaalai Jaah(i) Outaalai Andh Adhogad(i) Jai Hai||71||
translation: Absorbing themselves in all the hollow religions, they will perform evil deeds and reap the reward accordingly; they will be tied and despatched to the abode of death, where they will receive the suitable punishment.71.

gurmukhi: kr hY in`q AnrQ ArQ nhI eyk kmY hYN ]nih lY hYN hir nwm dwn kwhU nhI dY hYN ]in`q ie`k mq qjY ie`k miq in`q aucY hYN ]72]
transliteration: Kar Hai Nitt Anarth Arth Nahi Ek Kamai Hain|| Nah(i) Lai Hain Har(i) Naam Daan Kaahoo Nahidai Hain|| Nitt Ikk Mat Tajai Ikk Mat(i) Nitt Ouchai Hain||72||
translation: The people will perform useless tasks and not the meaningful ones; they will neither remember the Name of the Lord nor even give anything in charity; they will always leave one religion and eulogise the other one.72.

gurmukhi: in`q ie`k mq imtY auTY hY in`q iek mq ]Drm krm rih gieE BeI bsuDw AaurY giq ]Brm Drm ko gieE pwp pRcuirE jhwN qh ]73]
transliteration: Nitt Ikk Maat Matai Outhai Hai Nitt Ik Mat|| Dharam Karam Rah(i) Gado Bhai Basudhaa Aurat Gad(i)|| Bharam Dharma Ko Gado Paap Prachurio Jahaan Tah||73
translation: One sect will die out everyday and the other one will become prevalent; there will be no religious karmas and the situation of the earth will also changes; the dharma will not be honoured and there will be the propagation of sin everywhere.73.

gurmukhi: siRSt ieSt qij dIn krq AwirSt puSt sB ]ibSt siRSt qy imtI Bey pwipSt BiRSt qb ]iek ie`k inMd hY ie`k ie`k kih hs c`lYN ]74]
transliteration: Srisht Isht Taj(i) Deen Karat Aarisht Pousht Sabh|| Bisht Srisht Te Mitibhae Paapisht Bhrisht Tab|| Ik Ikk Nind Hai Ikk Ikk Kah(i) Has Challain||74||
translation: The people of the earth, leaving their religion, will be engrossed in very great sinful acts and when all will become defiled on account of sinful acts, even the rain will not fall on the earth; everyone will slander the other and move away after deriding

gurmukhi: qjI Awn jhwn kwn khU nhI mwnih ]qwq mwq kI inMd nIc auch sm jwnih ]Drm Brm ko gieE BeI iek brx pRjw sB ]75]
transliteration: Tajiaan Jahaan Kaan Kahoo Nahi Maanab(i)|| Taat Maat Ki Nind Neech Ouchah Sam Jaanah(i)|| Dharam Bharam Ko Gado Bhaiik Baran Prajaa Sabh||75||
translation: Forsaking the respect and honour of others, none will accept the advice of any other, none will accept the advice of any other; there will be the calumniation of the parents and the low people will be considered as high ones; there will be no fear of the

gurmukhi: kir hYN pwp Anyk n eyk Drm kr hYN nr ]imt jYhY sB KSt krm ky Drm Grn Gr ]nih sukiRq kmY hY ADogiq jYhY Amr log jYhY n br ]76]
transliteration: Kar(i) Hain Paap Anek Na Ek Dharam Kar Hain Nar|| Mit Aihai Sabh Khasht Karam Ke Dharam Gharan Ghar|| Nah(i) Soukrit Kamai Hai Adhogad(i) Jai-hai Amar Log Jai-hai Na Bar||76||
translation: The people will commit many sins and will not even do one task of righteousness; the six karmas will be finished from all the home and no one, on account of not doing good deeds, will enter the region of immortality and all will obtain the position of deg
